Darkmode-Hook

能让你的网页快速获取darkmode能力的JS小插件

Light
Dark

Install

      
  npm i @yangcongming/darkmode-hook -s

or

      
  <script src="./src/index.js"></script>

Usage

      
  import DarkmodeHook from "DarkmodeHook";
  const darkmode = new DarkmodeHook();
  // turn on the darkmode on you site
  darkmode.turnOn();
  // turn off
  darkmode.turnOff();
